OK, i have now watched&listened to this rip. My Final review:
V: 10  Video quality is amazing, almost like 10+.  
A: 8   I just listened with headphones (that i mentioned above in earlier comment) and the speech comes through as quite natural, good, but the strong orchestral soundtrack and thumping sound effects sounds unfortunately clearly compressed. Maybe YIFY should therefore add a little bit more kbs, 96 or 112kbps in some movies at least (like this one?). My overall verdict is 9,5.

NOTICE this release is NOT in 720p, it even says 1280x544 right in the description.

Obiviously if it's less than 800mb for a whole movie it isn't 720p, but I still wish people would quit slapping 720p on files that clearly are not.

That said, this is a very nice Rip and I'm about to download it at a second location, so I figured I should comment. I have no seedbox so it will stay in my list until 2.5:1 or until No Activity reaches 24 hours.

I personally prefer Stereo to 5.1 because of the added file size and also because 5.1 encoding tends to have a very wide dynamic range which makes it impossible to listen to dialog quietly over speakers.  My preference is 192kbps MP3 with a compressed dynamic range.  I know, I'm weird, but I can hear the dialog better that way.  5.1 ch in a

@ProphetZ. No, no, you're wrong ! THIS IS 720p. A full frame 16/9 widescreen picture is of course 1280x720, yes, but when you have that typical black borders-up-and-down widescreen called 2.35:1, then of course it will be 1280 in width and smaller in height (when stripped of those black borders) it will be like here 1280x544 - but of course it's still a proper 720p rip. Do you understand now ?
